item.description: http://www.facebook.c... We will be joined by a rep from the official campaign to get us started doing some phonebanking. He'll bring the phones and caller lists and we'll be talking with New Hampshire voters. Here's a video of first sign-making event: http://www.facebook.c... Park in lot across the street under the highway. We're on the 4th floor. Call Shem at (413) 230-12 45 if you get lost. We'll be on the fourth floor. We're going to make stencils and signs. If you can, please bring red and/or black spray paint, long pieces of cardboard, tarps, canvas, and any other materials you might think may appropriate. If you have some money to spend grab a roll of TYVEK HomeWrap ( http://www.homedepot.... ) And don't wear anything you don't want to see get painted! We'll have plenty of water and likely go out for food and drink after we're done.
item.name: Worcester Phonebanking & Sign-Making
